titleStmt.title: The meane in mourning. A sermon preached at Saint Maryes Spittle in London on Tuesday in Easter weeke. 1595. / By Thomas Playfere Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Widow Orwin for Andrew Wise, dwelling in Paules Church yeard, at the sign of the Angel.,

notesStmt.note: Also published with title: A most excellent and heauenly sermon vpon the 23 chapter of the gospell by Saint Luke--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yeard, at the sign of the Angel.
